HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content:
Users can toggle hauler behaviour (see Options > Mod Settings).

Setting it off (X) will disable Hand Me That Brick behaviour.

Setting it on (V) will re-enable material delivery serivces for construction jobs.

Hand Me That Brick update (November 27th, 2016):

Haulers will no longer assist in constructing buildings that require 0 materials (e.g. graves).
